Articles.Content:
Have anyone tried to run telamachus on linux version of KSP?

Does it works fine for you?
I tried it in 1.0.2 and it worked without a hitch.

OK, thx. 

I was asking because it works partially for me, i can send commands to ship but i dong get data back, for example map dont respond.

I thought that it didnt worked with linux at all.

I run telemachus on linux 1.02

It works partially. I am able to controll hip from web browser using flight controll or touchball. Right click menu on antenna shows that data is transferred.

But browser wont recive info from game, marker on map wont move and graphs display red "bad data".

What version of Telemachus are you using?

Also, threads merged.
